text: Hi I am facing the following issue while trying to install the HubSpot cli in my windows system. Could you help me how to install it properly
Looks like a firewall might be blocking npm repositories
Or your DNS is not resolving correctly. (network issue)
Probably a better question for <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development>, but  as a fellow PC user I would also suggest looking into WSL and installing the CLI on top of that
